channel.title: [Command] Checking length of input
channel.description:
Pretty easy I guess, but I'm not sure on how to go about this. Help would be appreciated.
How would I check the length of someones input. (Integer)
I've tried this [code] Integer.parseInt(args[1]).length [/code]
Gives me that it cannot be derefrenced and the other way that I've gone about it doesn't work too well.

item.title: [Command] Checking length of input
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Pretty easy I guess, but I’m not sure on how to go about this. Help would be appreciated.
